actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Current resolution relating to the recommendations of the Federal Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries, expressing the 5 percent per annum over the next six Congresses.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries should stagger or limit salary increases for Members of Congress to five percent per year for the next six years.

titles.title: Current resolution relating to the recommendations of the Federal Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries, expressing the 5 percent per annum over the next six Congresses.
